sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
shows that a state of affairs exists
, tisto nakazuje, da se nekaj dogaja ali obstaja, oziroma ljudi opozarja na to.

seg.quote: The post-mortem shows that death was due to natural causes.
These figures show an 8.5 per cent increase in exports.

sense.def:
Kadar slika
shows something
, je na njej nekaj upodobljeno.

seg.quote: The painting shows four athletes bathing.

sense.def:
To show something to someone
pomeni nekomu nekaj dati, ga odpeljati do nečesa ali ga opozoriti na nekaj, tako da si tisto ogleda.

seg.quote: Fetch that lovely drawing and show it to the vicar.
I showed William what I had written.
She showed me where to park the car.

sense.def:
To show someone to a room or seat
pomeni iti z nekom do določene sobe ali sedeža, kamor mora priti.

seg.quote: I was shown into a large apartment.

sense.def:
To show someone how to do something
pomeni, da nas nekdo opazuje, ko nekaj delamo, tako da se bo naučil tisto delati tudi sam.

seg.quote: The woman took the gun and showed how the cylinder slotted into the barrel.
Show us a card game.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
shows
, je vidno ali opazno.

seg.quote: The stitching is so fine that it doesn't show at all.
He had a strange fierce way of grinning that showed his teeth.
Come out from there and show yourself.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
shows a quality or characteristic
, lahko vidimo, da ima tisto določeno lastnost ali značilnost.

seg.quote: Prices began to show some signs of decline in 1974.
The sketch shows a lot of talent.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
shows a particular attitude towards someone or something
, je iz njegovega vedênja mogoče sklepati, kakšno je njegovo stališče do nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: I had been taught to show respect towards my elders.
This is a way in which Britain can show a readiness to help.
He dared not show that he was pleased.

sense.def:
To make or put on a show of having a feeling or attitude
pomeni vesti se tako, da ljudje mislijo, da nas preveva določen občutek ali da imamo do nečesa določeno stališče.

seg.quote: ...those who had made open shows of defiance.
She put on a good show of looking interested.

sense.def:
A show
je predstava v gledališču ali na televiziji; sestavljena je iz več točk.

Kadar film ali televizijska oddaja
is shown
, je na sporedu, da si jo ljudje lahko ogledajo.

seg.quote: One evening the school showed a cowboy film.

sense.def:
A show
je tudi prireditev, na kateri so predstavljeni predmeti določene vrste.

seg.quote: ...a flower show.

sense.def:
Kar je
on show
, je postavljeno v določenem prostoru, da si ljudje tisto lahko ogledajo.

seg.quote: The photographs are on show at the Museum until October.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
for show
, tisto naredimo samo zato, da bi ljudje o nas imeli dobro mnenje.

Kadar nekdo
has something to show for one's efforts
, je nekaj dosegel s svojim prizadevanjem.

seg.quote: Rodin's search was over and what he had to show for it was three slim dossiers.

sense.def:
A show of hands
je način glasovanja, pri katerem ljudje dvignejo roko, da jih nekdo prešteje.

To show off
pomeni prizadevati si, da bi naredili močan vtis na ljudi.

To show off something that one owns
pomeni tisto, kar je naša last, kazati veliko ljudem, ker smo na tisto ponosni.

seg.quote: He was eager to show off the new car.

sense.def:
To show someone round a place
pomeni voditi nekoga po določenem prostoru ali kraju in ga opozarjati na zanimivosti.

To show up
pomeni priti;

seg.quote: He showed up at ten o'clock the next morning.

sense.def:
To show someone up
pomeni, da smo z nekom v javnosti in se vedemo tako, da mu je zaradi nas neprijetno.
